Title: Establishes an annual spending growth cap and increases the maximum capacity of the rainy day fund
Summary: Establishes an annual spending growth cap and increases the maximum capacity of the rainy day fund.
LawCode: Add Art 17 §§244 - 246, amd §92-cc, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing a spending cap and increasing the maximum capacity of the rainy day fund
